inclusion.criterion: ability to come to the hospital 5 days per week for 3 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: refusal from further participation in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cirrhosis of the liver with liver failure class C according to the classification of Child-Pugh
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: alcohol use 140 g / week or more for men, and 70 g / week or more for women
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with positive serological reactions to hepatitis B and C
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: chronic kidney disease (GFR less than 30 ml / min / 1.73 m^2)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has symptoms of vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
